name: Basic Witch Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.
description:
You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the witch archetype, add two common spells of that level to your familiar.Basic Witch Spellcasting Leads To...

Expert Witch Spellcasting, Patron's BreadthTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
